holidays.title: National Wellness Month
holidays.description: Every August, celebrate National Wellness Month! Prioritize your self-care, reduce stress, and create healthier habits to feel like your best self!  We can often put our health…

holidays.title: Spider-Man Day
holidays.description: It's important to remember one thing: with great power comes great responsibility.

holidays.title: Albariño Day
holidays.description: Sit back, relax and discover all the facts about the fascinating albariño grape!

holidays.title: Benin Independence Day
holidays.description: Delve into the history of Benin and its long road to independence.

holidays.title: Colorado Day
holidays.description: Join all Coloradans as they celebrate the anniversary of their dear state!

holidays.title: Cycle to Work Day
holidays.description: We leave the car keys and grab a helmet instead for today's commute!

holidays.title: Emancipation Day (Guyana)
holidays.description: Let’s look at an account of Guyanese resilience, strength, and faith against the worst odds.

holidays.title: Guadalcanal Province Day
holidays.description: Do not miss learning everything about the cultural celebration in the Solomon Islands.

holidays.title: Homemade Pie Day
holidays.description: Put on your oven mitts as we prepare to bake it out on Homemade Pie Day.

holidays.title: India Pale Ale Day
holidays.description: Get ready to raise a glass and celebrate India Pale Ale Day. Cheers!

holidays.title: International Can-It Forward Day
holidays.description: Get your canning tools and can fresh produce with us on International Can-It-Forward Day!

holidays.title: International Childfree Day
holidays.description: It is actually okay not to have children. Let us discuss the implications and advantages.

holidays.title: Lammas Day
holidays.description: The traditions of harvesting festivals that are similar to Lammas Day have existed for centuries.

holidays.title: Lughnasadh
holidays.description: Lughnasadh celebrates new life, typifying “out with the old, in with the new!”

holidays.title: National Day of Benin
holidays.description: Learn why Benin’s struggles against slavery are a cornerstone of the National Day of Benin.

holidays.title: National IPA Day (India Pale Ale Beer)
holidays.description: Bottoms up, enjoy the unique taste of one of the most popular beverages around.

holidays.title: National Minority Donor Awareness Day
holidays.description: On this day, pledge to give someone a new lease on life.

holidays.title: National Planner Day
holidays.description: Get your planner, make plans for the day, and spend the day as ‘planned.’

holidays.title: National Promise to Care Day
holidays.description: Learn how you can honor urgent care workers and everything they do.

holidays.title: National Raspberry Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: Can you imagine a world without raspberry cream pies? Neither can we!

holidays.title: Play Ball Day
holidays.description: Get your gloves out, grab your bats, and rally the kids. It’s time to play ball!

holidays.title: Respect For Parents Day
holidays.description: Call up your parents or surprise them with a visit today.

holidays.title: Rounds Resounding Day
holidays.description: It’s the harmonies created by this form of singing that make it so popular and worth celebrating.

holidays.title: Santo Domingo Celebrations Start
holidays.description: Be ready to celebrate this traditional festivity in Nicaragua right here with us today.

holidays.title: Santo Domingo Celebrations Start
holidays.description: Santo Domingo Celebration Start is here, so let’s pray for a miracle together.

holidays.title: Start Up Day Across America
holidays.description: Startup Day Across America aims to help us understand entrepreneurship and innovation.

holidays.title: Switzerland National Day
holidays.description: To all Swiss people out there, enjoy this Independence Day with even more patriotism than before.

holidays.title: Woman Astronomers Day
holidays.description: Honor women’s under-appreciated achievements in science by learning about Woman Astronomers Day.

holidays.title: World Lung Cancer Day
holidays.description: Here's a quick guide to observing World Lung Cancer Day and staying well.

holidays.title: World Scout Scarf Day
holidays.description: The scouts’ scarf is not only a simple honor but is very practical too!

holidays.title: World Wide Web Day
holidays.description: Without the World Wide Web, the world as we know it would not be the same.

holidays.title: Yorkshire Day
holidays.description: Happy Yorkshire Day! Let’s promote and celebrate the largest county in the U.K.

holidays.title: Coolio’s Birthday
holidays.description: The iconic American rapper continues to be celebrated for his music which transcended conventional hip-hop.

holidays.title: Hailey Peters’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikTok star continues to inspire thousands of fitness fans all over the world.

holidays.title: Jason Momoa’s Birthday
holidays.description: This movie star and filmmaker is doing a fantastic job in the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Jerry Garcia’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented and iconic rock star will live on in our hearts forever.

holidays.title: Robert Van Tromp’s Birthday
holidays.description: From reality star to social media hunk — Van Tromp is just getting started.
